channel.title: Connection Error [317] Delta
channel.description:
Hi there,
I've used Jarmaker to pack my client which was a success, but after I opened my client.jar there is automaticly a connection error when there shouldn't be. It also says retrying in ## seconds.
This is what i get on the client..: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/55534911/000002.png[/img]
and then i get this on my server terminal [code]Loaded WorldMap In (76 ms)... Your server is now online. Connection from 127.0.0.1:50707 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50710 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50711 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50715 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50718 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50719 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50826 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50827 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50828 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50829 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50830 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50835 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) [/code] Can anyone please help me with this?
Thanks,
Samih.

item.title: Connection Error [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

Hi there,

I’ve used Jarmaker to pack my client which was a success, but after I opened my client.jar there is automaticly a connection error when there shouldn’t be. It also says retrying in ## seconds.

This is what i get on the client…:

and then i get this on my server terminal

Loaded WorldMap In (76 ms)... Your server is now online. Connection from 127.0.0.1:50707 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50710 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50711 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50715 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50718 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50719 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50826 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50827 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50828 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50829 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50830 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:50835 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (127.0.0.1)
Can anyone please help me with this?

Thanks,

Samih.
